content.rendered:
[vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1483783237471{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_row content_placement=”middle” layer_animation=”true”][vc_column][vc_column_text]The goal of RoG childrens ministry is to develop our children into men and women who fear and love God and are willing to be used by Him to transform their generation and the nation as a whole.

OUR CLASSES ARE DIVIDED INTO THE FOLLOWING AGE BRACKETS:

  • Fountain 2-3 years
  • Springing wells 4-5 years
  • Brook 6-7 years
  • Waterfall 8-9 years
  • Oasis 10-12 preteens

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_media_grid element_width=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1646819022783-f30ef4b2-94c5-2″ include=”11447,11382,11380,11446″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
